About

Designer profile

Résumé

Hey there!

Flattered you’d like to know me better. I’m a lover of thoughtful design that is user-focused, data-driven, and which is shaped by new technologies. The challenge of delivering products that impact people in meaningful ways is what drives me to keep learning about product design.

Away from design, you can find me climbing rocks, riding bikes, and playing video games to 90s hip-hop or chillwave.

Experience

WhiteHat Product Designer

WhiteHat is a startup, founded to ensure young people have access to the best career-focused apprenticeships on offer.

March 2020 - Present

HeyBryan Product Designer

HeyBryan is a startup that connects home service experts with anyone who needs tasks done around the home. My focus was on designing for growth, creating the design system, and running experiments to validate features.

10 months

TrustedHousesitters Product Designer

TrustedHousesitters is a house and pet sitting platform for people to look after pets in exchange for a place to stay. I started my time here creating the design system and redesigning the web app. I then began working in design sprints to develop features for both the web and mobile app.

1 year 5 months

Claromentis Product Designer

Claromentis is a digital workspace that helps teams share files, communicate, and work together. I worked across multiple disciplines including user interface design, user experience design, and front-end development.

2 years 7 months

Kineo Student Developer

Kineo is a workplace learning company specialising in e-learning content. I worked alongside designers and developers to create graphical assets and help bring designs to life in code.

1 year
